html:
3.4.19  12:52 pm   Cynicism is devouring me. Help!
What should I do?

     cynicize something you have never cynicized before

3.4.19  12:42 pm   I have concluded that birthdays make me unhappy... opinions on birthdays?

     you gotta watch out for the come down

3.4.19  12:27 pm   Do you enjoy making content,

     baking it if possible

      or are you doing it because it's just what your life turned out to be?

     ah that reminds me of the people who climbed mount everest. they never knew they were going to do it until one day they just ended up there

3.4.19  12:22 pm   do you find the obsession of specific human beings fascinating or rather is it a concept that you would rather not touch?

     every bit of this universe is worth obsessing over. the only problem is there is so little time

3.4.19  10:36 am   Is it worth stressing about everything I do, or is it worth letting go of the weight on my shoulders?

     it might be worth it if you can worry about it just constructively enough to make it the best it can be

3.4.19  9:52 am   what do you like to wear?

     the shoe especially if it fits

3.4.19  9:21 am   What would be the hat to end all hats? What could you wear on your head that would make people stop what they are doing and stare in awe and amazement?

     if this didn't do that for you then i'm not sure what else i can offer

3.4.19  8:51 am   bill help how to notate a line that is spoken/rapped rather than sung???

     i use x heads, and often approximate up and down if tone is important

3.4.19  8:46 am   hey in the latest installment of your reality tv drama you mentioned that you had some songs that "you wouldn't even think of releasing". do those still remain unreleased?

     some of them but not all of them

3.4.19  6:33 am   Guess what?
The universe is dying and we can't stop it.

     my assessment is different, i thought it was "living" not dying

     
Why don't we do something?
Also butt.
Thank you.

3.4.19  5:03 am   If hot air rises then why is it so cold on top of mountains?

     the heat rose too high. no ceiling. it rose way above the mountains

3.4.19  3:23 am   I think I write pretty good lyrics. I mean ya that's right I do. Anyway I don't know shit about music though and I can't find someone the write songs with so I'm just stuck with these lyrics what do I do?

     you have 4 choices.
     1. figure out how to write the music yourself
     2.meet someone who is able and willing to do it for you
     3. skip the music and just let the words be non-musical, or
     4. just forget the whole thing

3.4.19  2:47 am   you have said you find gender exciting. can you elaborate? what is the most exciting thing about gender for you?

     i love things being the same and i love things being different. differences and similarities are among the many things that excite me. there are many many ways for people to be similar and different, in more ways than perhaps any of us realize

3.4.19  1:41 am   Are science and magic interrelated?

     magic and science

3.4.19  12:45 am   what is the most important yet unnecessary thing i your opinion and why?

     our entire universe

3.4.19  12:20 am   If you had a japanese style futon, would you use it to sleep on?

     it depends what else i have

3.4.19  12:01 am   are there any songs of yours you're proud of?

     all of them

3.3.19  11:54 pm   are you good at singing and playing at the same time

     singing what and playing what

3.3.19  11:38 pm   what is tempo crisis when writing?

     it's when you are working on a song and you are running through the part you have but you start running through it faster cuz you already know it, etc, and as a result you may end up writing the next section to fit better with a faster tempo (i.e. it would sound slow and empty if you actually kept it the same tempo that would have worked for the first half). it's any time you are writing a song and different parts seem to not work at each other's tempo

      why the metronome

     to lock in the tempo that worked good for the first part you wrote, to ensure you don't start coming up with other parts that disagree with that tempo

3.3.19  11:32 pm   how is the earth? 

     big and strong

3.3.19  11:30 pm   how much does it take to convince your brain to give a damn

     about 23 dollars

3.3.19  11:05 pm   Ive forgotten how to breath, can you remind me

     open up emotionally with your surroundings

3.3.19  11:01 pm   how are you gonna do the overlapping vocal lines on la de da live???

     there's never overlapping leads. if you're talking about the last chorus, that's even done on the record to be backgrounds for the first bar of the last chorus, and the lead doesn't come back until "de day way oh"

3.3.19  10:10 pm   What did capital letters ever do to you?

     helped me express myself

3.3.19  10:06 pm   what is your favorite movie that came out last year?

     game night

3.3.19  9:56 pm   does tuesday exist?

     on paper it does

      i have never had a meaningful tuesday, so i'm doubting the day's existence.

     you are not alone

3.3.19  9:29 pm   If you could upload a music video better than Mt.Saint Helens would it get featured?

     i've had music videos better and worse than mt st helens get featured. the video for mt st helens was also featured

3.3.19  8:55 pm   what's the bad thing that you did, bill?

     my brain mixed up "hi" and "how's it going" and i just said "how" to someone

3.3.19  8:50 pm   i'm kind of confused. listening to the first thing you published on expert mode "late nite lounge" although it's kinda short, you use such complex harmony. if you were that knowledgeable and that good at that point in time what held you up for years before your songwriting?

     "lyrics"

3.3.19  8:27 pm   Why does my music never sound upbeat? ):

     you haven't made enough of it to get out all your various sadnesses

3.3.19  8:17 pm   what is your favorite letter of the rainbow?

     a

3.3.19  7:56 pm   Where in anew Canaan did you write "New Canaan"?

     in the locations mentioned in the song

3.3.19  6:54 pm   If you had 1 million dollars, how would you spend it?

     buy some gold maybe

3.3.19  6:36 pm   What is existence

     you, and me

3.3.19  5:53 pm   since you've started uploading more reality videos, does that mean that you'll start uploading more improv videos too?

     it means my schedule is even tighter than before, if that's even possible. so sure yes probably

3.3.19  4:47 pm   What're your thought about the NBA

     needs more basketball, probably

      and do you watch it?

     no

3.3.19  2:31 pm   What is rowdiness?

     horse play, and so forth

3.3.19  2:02 pm   When will the documentary about bill wurtz release?

     gradually, over time, on billwurtz.com/reality

3.3.19  2:02 pm   Is the new song called "Monday"?

     no

3.3.19  1:31 pm   I am not as far along in my art as I thought I would be at this point in my life. Any advice? 

     hurry

3.3.19  10:41 am   how can i be funny like u

     anyone can be funny. just do stuff that's not funny and wait for people to be mad at you for not being funny. at least that's the way i do it

3.3.19  10:38 am   what is your opinion on absurdism

     it can be a useful tactic in business negotiations

3.3.19  10:35 am   what do you think about midi

     seems legit

3.3.19  6:58 am   Why is the rhodes piano your preferred sound when you're composing? 

     it's the only sound that's really any good on that keyboard. and it's plain and simple. doesn't distract

3.3.19  5:05 am   how do you get out of a loop?

     take the second ending

3.3.19  3:50 am   HOW MANY FUCKING LEVELS OF SUFFERING ARE THERE idk hwow much more of this i can take

     you are surely in the home stretch

3.3.19  2:29 am   do u enjoy receiving/answering philosophical questions?

     does philosophical mean thinking too much or thinking just the right amount? if it means thinking too much then i feel it shouldn't be done. if it means thinking just the right amount, i feel it shouldn't have such a long name

     also i donno if u needed to hear this but i love u

3.3.19  12:15 am   what's your favorite thing to do whenever you're not working on a song

     work on a video

3.3.19  12:02 am   Is your new vid gonna be by the bill wurtz band?

     yes

3.2.19  11:51 pm   Were the apocalyptic blimp lyrics for "Mount St. Helens is about to Blow Up" based on the lyrics in "gonna clean my room" (after the sun burns out and the sky falls down)?

     no
